whatsNew.title: What's New

features: üõ†Ô∏è Developer mode toggle with dedicated developer tools page for mod creators
üîå Comprehensive plugin system - Background customization, Discord Rich Presence, Flashbang (scheduled light mode), Themes (including Nightshift), and Sudo (mod conflict detection)
üé® New Bloodmoon theme with black-red gradients and crimson accents
üìÅ Folder-based profile management for better organization
üîÑ VPK file replacement feature for rapid mod development iteration
üì• Overhauled download system for better performance and reliability
‚öôÔ∏è Experimental features UI with user-specific feature flag overrides
üõ†Ô∏è Ingest Tool to add your matchdata to the Deadlock API
üêõ Fixed download total size displaying as 0.00 B
üì¶ Mods no longer removed from addons folder in vanilla mode
0.10.0.title: Profile Management, Developer Tools, Plugins & Enhanced Features

features: üîß Naprawiono numeracjƒô VPK, aby wype≈Çnia≈Ça luki sekwencyjnie zamiast dodawaƒá na ko≈Ñcu
üìÅ Naprawiono import profilu, kt√≥ry nie pomija≈Ç okna dialogowego drzewa plik√≥w dla mod√≥w wieloplikowych
üîÑ Naprawiono okno dialogowe wyboru pliku VPK, kt√≥re pojawia≈Ço siƒô przy ponownym w≈ÇƒÖczaniu mod√≥w z wieloma plikami
0.10.1.title: Poprawki VPK i Importu Profili

features: üéØ Crosshair publishing feature - create, publish, and browse community crosshairs with a built-in generator
‚öôÔ∏è Autoexec configuration editor - manage your autoexec.cfg file directly from the app
üîß Improved cache ingestion efficiency and plugin asset handling
‚å®Ô∏è Updated zoom shortcut key and improved shortcut display formatting
0.11.0.title: Crosshairs & Autoexec Support

features: üé® Custom crosshair UX improvements - option to disable and delete crosshairs from history
üåê Japanese language support added to the application
üîß Minor bug fixes and stability improvements
0.11.1.title: Crosshair UX Improvements & Japanese Support

features: üîí Auth refactor - improved authentication and authorization flow
0.12.0.title: Auth Refactor

features: üîß Fixed broken deep links
üîß Improved logging in desktop app
üîß Ensure we identify logged in users using their USER ID
0.13.0.title: Bug Fixes & Improvements
